_**User**_

This session is being continued from a previous conversation that ran out of context. The conversation is summarized below:
Analysis:
Let me chronologically analyze this conversation to ensure I capture all technical details and user requests:

**Initial Context from Summary:**
The conversation began with the user researching the `/reddjar` page and database schema, then planning a dual system for user-specific organizational entities. The user discovered they had already built similar systems (sitespren_tags, keywordshub_tags) and wanted to create both boolean entities (stars/flags/shapes) and custom tags for Reddit URLs.

**Database Schema Creation Phase:**
The user ran SQL to create three new tables:
1. `redditurlsvat_org_entities` - Boolean organizational entities
2. `redditurlsvat_tags` - User-defined tags  
3. `redditurlsvat_tags_relations` - Tag assignments
Plus modifications to `redditurlsvat` table adding `user_id` and `is_private_url` fields.

**UI Implementation Request:**
The user then requested UI implementation for ONLY the org entities system (explicitly not tags yet). They wanted:
- Modify global star column header to show "glob" text above a red star icon
- Add 3px black vertical separator after global star
- Add 5 org entity columns (star, flag, square, circle, triangle) with specific constraints
- Each column 20px width with 2px padding
- Numbers 1-5 and shape icons with text labels for development reference

**My Implementation:**
I successfully modified the ReddjarTable component to:
1. Updated column definitions to include separator and 5 org entity columns
2. Modified header rendering to show "glob" text above red star icon
3. Added vertical separator column
4. Implemented org entity columns with icons and labels
5. Applied width/padding constraints
6. Updated table body to render new columns (currently showing placeholder icons)

**Database Connection Implementation:**
I then created a `useOrgEntities` hook and connected the UI to the database:
1. Created `/app/(protected)/reddjar/hooks/useOrgEntities.ts` with full CRUD functionality
2. Updated ReddjarTable to use the hook
3. Implemented click handlers for toggling org entity states
4. Added visual feedback with opacity transitions

**Popup System Research:**
The user then asked me to study the popup template system. I found:
1. `FPopup1Template` system in `/components/ui/FPopup1Template/`
2. `FavaTani` popup system in `/app/(protected2)/fava/components/favaTaniPopup/`
3. Comprehensive documentation showing enterprise SaaS modal emulation
4. Complex features like dual header bars, 7-tab navigation, URL persistence, etc.

**Critical Issue Discovered:**
The user reported that my org entities implementation had broken the table - all columns to the right of the new org entity columns had disappeared. Only visible columns were:
- checkbox
- url_id  
- global star
- 5 new org entity columns

**Root Cause Analysis:**
I identified that the issue was with column pagination. The original `columnsPerPage` was set to 8, but with the addition of 6 new columns (5 org entities + 1 separator), the first 8 positions now contained:
1. `url_id`
2. `is_starred` (global star)
3. `separator1` 
4. `org_starred`
5. `org_flagged`
6. `org_squared` 
7. `org_circled`
8. `org_triangled`

This meant `url_datum` (position 9) and all subsequent columns were paginated to page 2, making them invisible.

**Fix Applied:**
I updated the `columnsPerPage` from 8 to 15 to accommodate the new columns and restore visibility of all existing columns.

      ALTER TABLE redditurlsvat 
      ADD COLUMN user_id UUID REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE SET NULL,
      ADD COLUMN is_private_url BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE;

      CREATE TABLE redditurlsvat_org_entities (
        entity_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
        fk_url_id INTEGER REFERENCES redditurlsvat(url_id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
        user_id UUID REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
        is_starred BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
        is_flagged BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
        is_squared BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
        is_circled BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
        is_triangled BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
        created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
        updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
        UNIQUE(fk_url_id, user_id)

   180‚Üí  
   181‚Üí  // Column pagination logic
   182‚Üí  const totalColumnPages = Math.ceil(columns.length / columnsPerPage);
   183‚Üí  const startColumnIndex = (currentColumnPage - 1) * columnsPerPage;
   184‚Üí  const visibleColumns = columns.slice(startColumnIndex, startColumnIndex + columnsPerPage);
   185‚Üí  
   186‚Üí  // Column Pagination Components - Define before use
   187‚Üí  // Bar 1: Columns per page quantity selector
   188‚Üí  const ColumnPaginationBar1 = () => {
   189‚Üí    return (
   190‚Üí      <div className="flex items-center">
   191‚Üí        <div className="flex items-center">
   192‚Üí          <span className="text-xs text-gray-600 mr-2">Cols/page:</span>
   193‚Üí          <button
   194‚Üí            onClick={() => {
   195‚Üí              setColumnsPerPage(4);
   196‚Üí              setCurrentColumnPage(1);
   197‚Üí            }}
   198‚Üí            className={`px-2 py-2.5 text-sm border rounded-l -mr-px cursor-pointer ${
   199‚Üí              columnsPerPage === 4 ? 'text-black border-black' : 'bg-white hover:bg-gray-200'
   200‚Üí            }`}
   201‚Üí            style={{ 
   202‚Üí              fontSize: '14px', 
   203‚Üí              paddingTop: '10px', 
   204‚Üí              paddingBottom: '10px',
   205‚Üí              backgroundColor: columnsPerPage === 4 ? '#f8f782' : undefined
   206‚Üí            }}
   207‚Üí          >
   208‚Üí            4
   209‚Üí          </button>
   210‚Üí          <button
   211‚Üí            onClick={() => {
   212‚Üí              setColumnsPerPage(6);
   213‚Üí              setCurrentColumnPage(1);
   214‚Üí            }}
   215‚Üí            className={`px-2 py-2.5 text-sm border -mr-px cursor-pointer ${
   216‚Üí              columnsPerPage === 6 ? 'text-black border-black' : 'bg-white hover:bg-gray-200'
   217‚Üí            }`}
   218‚Üí            style={{ 
   219‚Üí              fontSize: '14px',

   223‚Üí            }}

   225‚Üí            6
   226‚Üí          </button>
   227‚Üí          <button
   228‚Üí            onClick={() => {
   229‚Üí              setColumnsPerPage(8);
   230‚Üí              setCurrentColumnPage(1);
   231‚Üí            }}
   232‚Üí            className={`px-2 py-2.5 text-sm border -mr-px cursor-pointer ${
   233‚Üí              columnsPerPage === 8 ? 'text-black border-black' : 'bg-white hover:bg-gray-200'
   234‚Üí            }`}
   235‚Üí            style={{ 
   236‚Üí              fontSize: '14px', 
   237‚Üí              paddingTop: '10px', 
   238‚Üí              paddingBottom: '10px',
   239‚Üí              backgroundColor: columnsPerPage === 8 ? '#f8f782' : undefined
   240‚Üí            }}
   241‚Üí          >
   242‚Üí            8
   243‚Üí          </button>
   244‚Üí          <button
   245‚Üí            onClick={() => {
   246‚Üí              setColumnsPerPage(10);
   247‚Üí              setCurrentColumnPage(1);
   248‚Üí            }}
   249‚Üí            className={`px-2 py-2.5 text-sm border -mr-px cursor-pointer ${
   250‚Üí              columnsPerPage === 10 ? 'text-black border-black' : 'bg-white hover:bg-gray-200'
   251‚Üí            }`}
   252‚Üí            style={{ 
   253‚Üí              fontSize: '14px', 
   254‚Üí              paddingTop: '10px', 
   255‚Üí              paddingBottom: '10px',
   256‚Üí              backgroundColor: columnsPerPage === 10 ? '#f8f782' : undefined
   257‚Üí            }}
   258‚Üí          >
   259‚Üí            10
   260‚Üí          </button>
   261‚Üí          <button
   262‚Üí            onClick={() => {
   263‚Üí              setColumnsPerPage(12);
   264‚Üí              setCurrentColumnPage(1);
   265‚Üí            }}
   266‚Üí            className={`px-2 py-2.5 text-sm border rounded-r cursor-pointer ${
   267‚Üí              columnsPerPage === 12 ? 'text-black border-black' : 'bg-white hover:bg-gray-200'
   268‚Üí            }`}
   269‚Üí            style={{ 
   270‚Üí              fontSize: '14px', 
   271‚Üí              paddingTop: '10px', 
   272‚Üí              paddingBottom: '10px',
   273‚Üí              backgroundColor: columnsPerPage === 12 ? '#f8f782' : undefined
   274‚Üí            }}
   275‚Üí          >
   276‚Üí            12
   277‚Üí          </button>
   278‚Üí        </div>
   279‚Üí      </div>
   280‚Üí    );
   281‚Üí  };
   282‚Üí
   283‚Üí  // Bar 2: Current column page selector
   284‚Üí  const ColumnPaginationBar2 = () => {
   285‚Üí    if (totalColumnPages <= 1) return null;
   286‚Üí    
   287‚Üí    return (
   288‚Üí      <div className="flex items-center">
   289‚Üí        <div className="flex items-center">
   290‚Üí          <span className="text-xs text-gray-600 mr-2">Col page:</span>
   291‚Üí          <button
   292‚Üí            onClick={() => setCurrentColumnPage(1)}
   293‚Üí            disabled={currentColumnPage === 1}
   294‚Üí            className="px-2 py-2.5 text-sm border rounded-l -mr-px disabled:opacity-50 disabled:cursor-not-allowed cursor-pointer bg-white hover:bg-gray-200"
   295‚Üí            style={{ fontSize: '14px', paddingTop: '10px', paddingBottom: '10px' }}
   296‚Üí          >
   297‚Üí            First
   298‚Üí          </button>
   299‚Üí          <button
   300‚Üí            onClick={() => setCurrentColumnPage(currentColumnPage - 1)}
   301‚Üí            disabled={currentColumnPage === 1}
   302‚Üí            className="px-2 py-2.5 text-sm border -mr-px disabled:opacity-50 disabled:cursor-not-allowed cursor-pointer bg-white hover:bg-gray-200"
   303‚Üí            style={{ fontSize: '14px', paddingTop: '10px', paddingBottom: '10px' }}
   304‚Üí          >
   305‚Üí            Prev
   306‚Üí          </button>
   307‚Üí          
   308‚Üí          {Array.from({ length: Math.min(5, totalColumnPages) }, (_, i) => {
   309‚Üí            const pageNum = Math.max(1, Math.min(totalColumnPages - 4, currentColumnPage - 2)) + i;
   310‚Üí            if (pageNum > totalColumnPages) return null;
   311‚Üí            return (
   312‚Üí              <button
   313‚Üí                key={pageNum}
   314‚Üí                onClick={() => setCurrentColumnPage(pageNum)}
   315‚Üí                className={`px-2 py-2.5 text-sm border -mr-px cursor-pointer ${
   316‚Üí                  currentColumnPage === pageNum 
   317‚Üí                    ? 'bg-blue-500 text-white border-blue-500' 
   318‚Üí                    : 'bg-white hover:bg-gray-200'
   319‚Üí                }`}
   320‚Üí                style={{ 
   321‚Üí                  fontSize: '14px', 
   322‚Üí                  paddingTop: '10px', 
   323‚Üí                  paddingBottom: '10px'
   324‚Üí                }}
   325‚Üí              >
   326‚Üí                {pageNum}
   327‚Üí              </button>
   328‚Üí            );
   329‚Üí          })}
   330‚Üí          
   331‚Üí          <button
   332‚Üí            onClick={() => setCurrentColumnPage(currentColumnPage + 1)}
   333‚Üí            disabled={currentColumnPage === totalColumnPages}
   334‚Üí            className="px-2 py-2.5 text-sm border -mr-px disabled:opacity-50 disabled:cursor-not-allowed cursor-pointer bg-white hover:bg-gray-200"
   335‚Üí            style={{ fontSize: '14px', paddingTop: '10px', paddingBottom: '10px' }}
   336‚Üí          >
   337‚Üí            Next
   338‚Üí          </button>
   339‚Üí          <button
   340‚Üí            onClick={() => setCurrentColumnPage(totalColumnPages)}
   341‚Üí            disabled={currentColumnPage === totalColumnPages}
   342‚Üí            className="px-2 py-2.5 text-sm border rounded-r disabled:opacity-50 disabled:cursor-not-allowed cursor-pointer bg-white hover:bg-gray-200"
   343‚Üí            style={{ fontSize: '14px', paddingTop: '10px', paddingBottom: '10px' }}
   344‚Üí          >
   345‚Üí            Last
   346‚Üí          </button>
   347‚Üí        </div>
   348‚Üí      </div>
   349‚Üí    );
   350‚Üí  };
   351‚Üí  
   352‚Üí  // Pass pagination components to parent
   353‚Üí  useEffect(() => {
   354‚Üí    if (onColumnPaginationRender) {
   355‚Üí      onColumnPaginationRender({
   356‚Üí        ColumnPaginationBar1,
   357‚Üí        ColumnPaginationBar2
   358‚Üí      });
   359‚Üí    }
   360‚Üí  }, [onColumnPaginationRender, currentColumnPage, totalColumnPages]);
   361‚Üí
   362‚Üí  // Fetch data
   363‚Üí  useEffect(() => {
   364‚Üí    fetchData();
   365‚Üí  }, []);
   366‚Üí  
   367‚Üí  const fetchData = async () => {
   368‚Üí    try {
   369‚Üí      setLoading(true);
   370‚Üí      
   371‚Üí      // Fetch main data first
   372‚Üí      const { data: tableData, error: fetchError } = await supabase
   373‚Üí        .from('redditurlsvat')
   374‚Üí        .select('*')
   375‚Üí        .order('created_at', { ascending: false });
   376‚Üí        
   377‚Üí      if (fetchError) throw fetchError;
   378‚Üí      
   379‚Üí      if (!tableData || tableData.length === 0) {
   380‚Üí        setData([]);
   381‚Üí        return;
   382‚Üí      }
   383‚Üí      
   384‚Üí      // Initialize data with count_obls as 0 for now
   385‚Üí      const processedData = tableData.map(item => ({
   386‚Üí        ...item,
   387‚Üí        count_obls: 0
   388‚Üí      }));
   389‚Üí      
   390‚Üí      setData(processedData);
   391‚Üí      
   392‚Üí      // Fetch counts asynchronously without blocking the UI
   393‚Üí      fetchOutboundLinkCounts(processedData);
   394‚Üí      
   395‚Üí    } catch (err) {
   396‚Üí      console.error('Error fetching reddit urls:', err);
   397‚Üí      setError('Failed to fetch reddit urls');
   398‚Üí    } finally {
   399‚Üí      setLoading(false);
   400‚Üí    }
   401‚Üí  };
   402‚Üí
   403‚Üí  // Separate function to fetch outbound link counts
   404‚Üí  const fetchOutboundLinkCounts = async (tableData: RedditUrl[]) => {
   405‚Üí    try {
   406‚Üí      // Get all outbound links and count by source_url_id
   407‚Üí      const { data: linkCounts } = await supabase
   408‚Üí        .from('redditoblinks')
   409‚Üí        .select('source_url_id');
   410‚Üí      
   411‚Üí      if (linkCounts) {
   412‚Üí        // Create a map of url_id to count
   413‚Üí        const countsMap = new Map();
   414‚Üí        linkCounts.forEach(link => {
   415‚Üí          const count = countsMap.get(link.source_url_id) || 0;
   416‚Üí          countsMap.set(link.source_url_id, count + 1);
   417‚Üí        });
   418‚Üí        
   419‚Üí        // Update the data with counts
   420‚Üí        const updatedData = tableData.map(item => ({
   421‚Üí          ...item,
   422‚Üí          count_obls: countsMap.get(item.url_id) || 0
   423‚Üí        }));
   424‚Üí        
   425‚Üí        setData(updatedData);
   426‚Üí      }
   427‚Üí    } catch (err) {
   428‚Üí      console.warn('Error fetching outbound link counts:', err);
   429‚Üí      // Keep the original data with counts as 0
   430‚Üí    }
   431‚Üí  };
   432‚Üí  
   433‚Üí  // Filter and sort data
   434‚Üí  const filteredAndSortedData = useMemo(() => {
   435‚Üí    let filtered = data.filter(item => {
   436‚Üí      // Apply search term filter
   437‚Üí      if (searchTerm && !Object.values(item).some(value => 
   438‚Üí        value?.toString().toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase())
   439‚Üí      )) {
   440‚Üí        return false;
   441‚Üí      }
   442‚Üí      
   443‚Üí      // Apply commentable filter
   444‚Üí      if (commentableFilter !== 'all') {
   445‚Üí        if (commentableFilter === 'yes' && item.is_commentable !== true) {
   446‚Üí          return false;
   447‚Üí        }
   448‚Üí        if (commentableFilter === 'no' && item.is_commentable !== false) {
   449‚Üí          return false;
   450‚Üí        }
   451‚Üí      }
   452‚Üí      
   453‚Üí      // Apply scrape status filter
   454‚Üí      if (scrapeStatusFilter !== 'all') {
   455‚Üí        if (scrapeStatusFilter === 'success' && item.is_commentable_scrape_status !== 'success') {
   456‚Üí          return false;
   457‚Üí        }
   458‚Üí        if (scrapeStatusFilter === 'failed' && item.is_commentable_scrape_status !== 'failed') {
   459‚Üí          return false;
   460‚Üí        }
   461‚Üí      }
   462‚Üí      
   463‚Üí      return true;
   464‚Üí    });
   465‚Üí
   466‚Üí    // Sort data
   467‚Üí    filtered.sort((a, b) => {
   468‚Üí      const aValue = a[sortField];
   469‚Üí      const bValue = b[sortField];
   470‚Üí      
   471‚Üí      if (aValue === null && bValue === null) return 0;
   472‚Üí      if (aValue === null) return sortOrder === 'asc' ? -1 : 1;
   473‚Üí      if (bValue === null) return sortOrder === 'asc' ? 1 : -1;
   474‚Üí      
   475‚Üí      if (aValue < bValue) return sortOrder === 'asc' ? -1 : 1;
   476‚Üí      if (aValue > bValue) return sortOrder === 'asc' ? 1 : -1;
   477‚Üí      return 0;
   478‚Üí    });
   479‚Üí
   480‚Üí    return filtered;
   481‚Üí  }, [data, searchTerm, sortField, sortOrder, commentableFilter, scrapeStatusFilter]);
   482‚Üí
   483‚Üí  // Pagination
   484‚Üí  const totalPages = Math.ceil(filteredAndSortedData.length / itemsPerPage);
   485‚Üí  const startIndex = (currentPage - 1) * itemsPerPage;
   486‚Üí  const paginatedData = filteredAndSortedData.slice(startIndex, startIndex + itemsPerPage);
   487‚Üí
   488‚Üí  const handleSort = (field: keyof RedditUrl) => {
   489‚Üí    if (sortField === field) {
   490‚Üí      setSortOrder(sortOrder === 'asc' ? 'desc' : 'asc');
   491‚Üí    } else {
   492‚Üí      setSortField(field);
   493‚Üí      setSortOrder('asc');
   494‚Üí    }
   495‚Üí  };
   496‚Üí
   497‚Üí  // Handle inline editing
   498‚Üí  const handleCellClick = (id: number, field: string, currentValue: any) => {
   499‚Üí    if (field === 'url_id' || field === 'created_at') {
   500‚Üí      return; // Don't allow editing these fields
   501‚Üí    }
   502‚Üí    
   503‚Üí    setEditingCell({ id, field });
   504‚Üí    setEditingValue(currentValue?.toString() || '');
   505‚Üí  };
   506‚Üí
   507‚Üí  const handleCellSave = async () => {
   508‚Üí    if (!editingCell) return;
   509‚Üí
   510‚Üí    const { id, field } = editingCell;
   511‚Üí    let processedValue: any = editingValue;
   512‚Üí
   513‚Üí    // Process value based on field type
   514‚Üí    const column = columns.find(col => col.key === field);
   515‚Üí    if (column?.type === 'boolean') {
   516‚Üí      processedValue = editingValue === 'true' || editingValue === '1' || editingValue.toLowerCase() === 'yes';
   517‚Üí    } else if (column?.type === 'integer') {
   518‚Üí      processedValue = editingValue === '' ? null : parseInt(editingValue);
   519‚Üí      if (isNaN(processedValue)) {
   520‚Üí        processedValue = null;
   521‚Üí      }
   522‚Üí    } else if (column?.type === 'decimal') {
   523‚Üí      processedValue = editingValue === '' ? null : parseFloat(editingValue);
   524‚Üí      if (isNaN(processedValue)) {
   525‚Üí        processedValue = null;
   526‚Üí      }
   527‚Üí    } else if (column?.type === 'json') {
   528‚Üí      if (editingValue.trim()) {
   529‚Üí        try {
   530‚Üí          processedValue = JSON.parse(editingValue);
   531‚Üí        } catch {
   532‚Üí          alert('Invalid JSON format');
   533‚Üí          return;
   534‚Üí        }
   535‚Üí      } else {
   536‚Üí        processedValue = null;
   537‚Üí      }
   538‚Üí    } else if (column?.type === 'array') {
   539‚Üí      if (editingValue.trim()) {
   540‚Üí        try {
   541‚Üí          processedValue = JSON.parse(editingValue);
   542‚Üí          if (!Array.isArray(processedValue)) {
   543‚Üí            // If it's not an array, make it one
   544‚Üí            processedValue = [processedValue];
   545‚Üí          }
   546‚Üí        } catch {
   547‚Üí          // Try to split by comma as fallback
   548‚Üí          processedValue = editingValue.split(',').map(s => s.trim()).filter(s => s);
   549‚Üí        }
   550‚Üí      } else {
   551‚Üí        processedValue = null;
   552‚Üí      }
   553‚Üí    } else if (editingValue === '') {
   554‚Üí      processedValue = null;
   555‚Üí    }
   556‚Üí
   557‚Üí    await updateField(id, field as keyof RedditUrl, processedValue);
   558‚Üí    setEditingCell(null);
   559‚Üí    setEditingValue('');
   560‚Üí  };
   561‚Üí
   562‚Üí  const handleCellCancel = () => {
   563‚Üí    setEditingCell(null);
   564‚Üí    setEditingValue('');
   565‚Üí  };
   566‚Üí
   567‚Üí  const updateField = async (id: number, field: keyof RedditUrl, value: any) => {
   568‚Üí    try {
   569‚Üí      const { error } = await supabase
   570‚Üí        .from('redditurlsvat')
   571‚Üí        .update({ [field]: value })
   572‚Üí        .eq('url_id', id);
   573‚Üí
   574‚Üí      if (error) {
   575‚Üí        console.error('Error updating field:', error);
   576‚Üí        return;
   577‚Üí      }
   578‚Üí
   579‚Üí      // Update local state
   580‚Üí      setData(prev => prev.map(item => 
   581‚Üí        item.url_id === id ? { ...item, [field]: value } : item
   582‚Üí      ));
   583‚Üí    } catch (error) {
   584‚Üí      console.error('Error updating field:', error);
   585‚Üí    }
   586‚Üí  };
   587‚Üí
   588‚Üí  // Toggle star status with immediate UI update
   589‚Üí  const toggleStar = async (id: number, currentValue: boolean | null) => {
   590‚Üí    const newValue = !currentValue;
   591‚Üí    
   592‚Üí    // Optimistically update UI immediately
   593‚Üí    setData(prev => prev.map(item => 
   594‚Üí      item.url_id === id ? { ...item, is_starred: newValue } : item
   595‚Üí    ));
   596‚Üí    
   597‚Üí    // Update database
   598‚Üí    try {
   599‚Üí      const { error } = await supabase
   600‚Üí        .from('redditurlsvat')
   601‚Üí        .update({ is_starred: newValue })
   602‚Üí        .eq('url_id', id);
   603‚Üí
   604‚Üí      if (error) {
   605‚Üí        console.error('Error updating star:', error);
   606‚Üí        // Revert optimistic update on error
   607‚Üí        setData(prev => prev.map(item => 
   608‚Üí          item.url_id === id ? { ...item, is_starred: currentValue } : item
   609‚Üí        ));
   610‚Üí      }
   611‚Üí    } catch (error) {
   612‚Üí      console.error('Error updating star:', error);
   613‚Üí      // Revert optimistic update on error
   614‚Üí      setData(prev => prev.map(item => 
   615‚Üí        item.url_id === id ? { ...item, is_starred: currentValue } : item
   616‚Üí      ));
   617‚Üí    }
   618‚Üí  };
   619‚Üí
   620‚Üí  // Create new record inline
   621‚Üí  const createNewUrlInline = async () => {
   622‚Üí    try {
   623‚Üí      const { data: newRecord, error } = await supabase
   624‚Üí        .from('redditurlsvat')
   625‚Üí        .insert({
   626‚Üí          url_datum: null,
   627‚Üí          is_commentable: true,
   628‚Üí          subreddit_name: null,
   629‚Üí          post_id: null,
   630‚Üí          post_title: null,
   631‚Üí          keyword: null,
   632‚Üí          current_position: null,
   633‚Üí          previous_position: 0,
   634‚Üí          position_type: 'Organic',
   635‚Üí          search_volume: null,
   636‚Üí          keyword_difficulty: null,
   637‚Üí          cpc: null,
   638‚Üí          competition: null,
   639‚Üí          number_of_results: null,
   640‚Üí          estimated_traffic: null,
   641‚Üí          traffic_percentage: 0,
   642‚Üí          estimated_traffic_cost: null,
   643‚Üí          trends_data: null,
   644‚Üí          serp_features: null,
   645‚Üí          keyword_intents: null,
   646‚Üí          data_timestamp: null
   647‚Üí        })
   648‚Üí        .select()
   649‚Üí        .single();
   650‚Üí
   651‚Üí      if (error) {
   652‚Üí        console.error('Error creating new reddit url record:', error);
   653‚Üí        return;
   654‚Üí      }
   655‚Üí
   656‚Üí      // Add the new record to the local state
   657‚Üí      setData(prev => [newRecord, ...prev]);
   658‚Üí      
   659‚Üí      // Reset to first page to show the new record
   660‚Üí      setCurrentPage(1);
   661‚Üí    } catch (error) {
   662‚Üí      console.error('Error creating new reddit url record:', error);
   663‚Üí    }
   664‚Üí  };
   665‚Üí
   666‚Üí  // Handle create from modal
   667‚Üí  const handleCreate = async () => {
   668‚Üí    try {
   669‚Üí      let trendsData = null;
   670‚Üí      if (formData.trends_data && formData.trends_data.trim()) {
   671‚Üí        try {
   672‚Üí          trendsData = JSON.parse(formData.trends_data);
   673‚Üí        } catch (parseError) {
   674‚Üí          alert('Invalid JSON in trends_data field. Please check the format.');
   675‚Üí          return;
   676‚Üí        }
   677‚Üí      }
   678‚Üí
   679‚Üí      let serpFeatures = null;
   680‚Üí      if (formData.serp_features && formData.serp_features.trim()) {
   681‚Üí        try {
   682‚Üí          serpFeatures = JSON.parse(formData.serp_features);
   683‚Üí          if (!Array.isArray(serpFeatures)) {
   684‚Üí            serpFeatures = [serpFeatures];
   685‚Üí          }
   686‚Üí        } catch (parseError) {
   687‚Üí          serpFeatures = formData.serp_features.split(',').map(s => s.trim()).filter(s => s);
   688‚Üí        }
   689‚Üí      }
   690‚Üí
   691‚Üí      let keywordIntents = null;
   692‚Üí      if (formData.keyword_intents && formData.keyword_intents.trim()) {
   693‚Üí        try {
   694‚Üí          keywordIntents = JSON.parse(formData.keyword_intents);
   695‚Üí          if (!Array.isArray(keywordIntents)) {
   696‚Üí            keywordIntents = [keywordIntents];
   697‚Üí          }
   698‚Üí        } catch (parseError) {
   699‚Üí          keywordIntents = formData.keyword_intents.split(',').map(s => s.trim()).filter(s => s);
   700‚Üí        }
   701‚Üí      }
   702‚Üí      
   703‚Üí      const insertData = {
   704‚Üí        url_datum: formData.url_datum?.trim() || null,
   705‚Üí        is_commentable: formData.is_commentable,
   706‚Üí        subreddit_name: formData.subreddit_name?.trim() || null,
   707‚Üí        post_id: formData.post_id?.trim() || null,
   708‚Üí        post_title: formData.post_title?.trim() || null,
   709‚Üí        keyword: formData.keyword?.trim() || null,
   710‚Üí        current_position: formData.current_position || null,
   711‚Üí        previous_position: formData.previous_position || 0,
   712‚Üí        position_type: formData.position_type?.trim() || 'Organic',
   713‚Üí        search_volume: formData.search_volume || null,
   714‚Üí        keyword_difficulty: formData.keyword_difficulty || null,
   715‚Üí        cpc: formData.cpc || null,
   716‚Üí        competition: formData.competition || null,
   717‚Üí        number_of_results: formData.number_of_results || null,
   718‚Üí        estimated_traffic: formData.estimated_traffic || null,
   719‚Üí        traffic_percentage: formData.traffic_percentage || 0,
   720‚Üí        estimated_traffic_cost: formData.estimated_traffic_cost || null,
   721‚Üí        trends_data: trendsData,
   722‚Üí        serp_features: serpFeatures,
   723‚Üí        keyword_intents: keywordIntents,
   724‚Üí        data_timestamp: formData.data_timestamp?.trim() || null
   725‚Üí      };
   726‚Üí      
   727‚Üí      const { error: insertError } = await supabase
   728‚Üí        .from('redditurlsvat')
   729‚Üí        .insert([insertData]);
   730‚Üí        
   731‚Üí      if (insertError) throw insertError;
   732‚Üí      
   733‚Üí      setIsCreateModalOpen(false);
   734‚Üí      resetForm();
   735‚Üí      fetchData();
   736‚Üí    } catch (err) {
   737‚Üí      console.error('Error creating record:', err);
   738‚Üí      alert(`Failed to create record: ${err instanceof Error ? err.message : 'Unknown error'}`);
   739‚Üí    }
   740‚Üí  };
   741‚Üí
   742‚Üí  // Reset form
   743‚Üí  const resetForm = () => {
   744‚Üí    setFormData({
   745‚Üí      url_datum: '',
   746‚Üí      is_commentable: true,
   747‚Üí      subreddit_name: '',
   748‚Üí      post_id: '',
   749‚Üí      post_title: '',
   750‚Üí      keyword: '',
   751‚Üí      current_position: 0,
   752‚Üí      previous_position: 0,
   753‚Üí      position_type: 'Organic',
   754‚Üí      search_volume: 0,
   755‚Üí      keyword_difficulty: 0,
   756‚Üí      cpc: 0,
   757‚Üí      competition: 0,
   758‚Üí      number_of_results: 0,
   759‚Üí      estimated_traffic: 0,
   760‚Üí      traffic_percentage: 0,
   761‚Üí      estimated_traffic_cost: 0,
   762‚Üí      trends_data: '',
   763‚Üí      serp_features: '',
   764‚Üí      keyword_intents: '',
   765‚Üí      data_timestamp: ''
   766‚Üí    });
   767‚Üí  };
   768‚Üí
   769‚Üí  // Fetch outbound links for a specific URL
   770‚Üí  const fetchOutboundLinks = async (urlId: number) => {
   771‚Üí    if (outboundLinks[urlId]) {
   772‚Üí      return; // Already fetched
   773‚Üí    }
   774‚Üí
   775‚Üí    setLoadingLinks(prev => new Set(prev).add(urlId));
   776‚Üí    
   777‚Üí    try {
   778‚Üí      const { data, error } = await supabase
   779‚Üí        .from('redditoblinks')
   780‚Üí        .select('*')
   781‚Üí        .eq('source_url_id', urlId)
   782‚Üí        .order('created_at', { ascending: false });
   783‚Üí
   784‚Üí      if (error) {
   785‚Üí        console.error('Error fetching outbound links:', error);
   786‚Üí        return;
   787‚Üí      }
   788‚Üí
   789‚Üí      setOutboundLinks(prev => ({
   790‚Üí        ...prev,
   791‚Üí        [urlId]: data || []
   792‚Üí      }));
   793‚Üí    } catch (error) {
   794‚Üí      console.error('Error fetching outbound links:', error);
   795‚Üí    } finally {
   796‚Üí      setLoadingLinks(prev => {
   797‚Üí        const newSet = new Set(prev);
   798‚Üí        newSet.delete(urlId);
   799‚Üí        return newSet;
   800‚Üí      });
   801‚Üí    }
   802‚Üí  };
   803‚Üí
   804‚Üí  // Toggle expanded row
   805‚Üí  const toggleRowExpansion = (urlId: number) => {
   806‚Üí    const newExpanded = new Set(expandedRows);
   807‚Üí    if (newExpanded.has(urlId)) {
   808‚Üí      newExpanded.delete(urlId);
   809‚Üí    } else {
   810‚Üí      newExpanded.add(urlId);
   811‚Üí      // Fetch outbound links when expanding
   812‚Üí      fetchOutboundLinks(urlId);
   813‚Üí    }
   814‚Üí    setExpandedRows(newExpanded);
   815‚Üí  };
   816‚Üí
   817‚Üí  // Render cell content
   818‚Üí  const renderCell = (item: RedditUrl, column: typeof columns[0]) => {
   819‚Üí    const value = item[column.key];
   820‚Üí    const isEditing = editingCell?.id === item.url_id && editingCell?.field === column.key;
   821‚Üí    const isReadOnly = column.key === 'url_id' || column.key === 'created_at';
   822‚Üí
   823‚Üí    if (isEditing) {
   824‚Üí      return (
   825‚Üí        <div className="flex items-center space-x-2">
   826‚Üí          <textarea
   827‚Üí            value={editingValue}
   828‚Üí            onChange={(e) => setEditingValue(e.target.value)}
   829‚Üí            onBlur={handleCellSave}
   830‚Üí            onKeyDown={(e) => {
   831‚Üí              if (e.key === 'Enter' && !e.shiftKey) {
   832‚Üí                e.preventDefault();
   833‚Üí                handleCellSave();
   834‚Üí              }
   835‚Üí              if (e.key === 'Escape') handleCellCancel();
   836‚Üí            }}
   837‚Üí            className="w-full px-1 py-0.5 border border-blue-500 rounded text-sm focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 resize-none"
   838‚Üí            autoFocus
   839‚Üí            rows={column.type === 'json' || column.type === 'array' ? 3 : 1}
   840‚Üí          />
   841‚Üí          <button
   842‚Üí            onClick={handleCellSave}
   843‚Üí            className="text-green-600 hover:text-green-800 text-sm"
   844‚Üí            title="Save"
   845‚Üí          >
   846‚Üí            ‚úì
   847‚Üí          </button>
   848‚Üí          <button
   849‚Üí            onClick={handleCellCancel}
   850‚Üí            className="text-red-600 hover:text-red-800 text-sm"
   851‚Üí            title="Cancel"
   852‚Üí          >
   853‚Üí            ‚úï
   854‚Üí          </button>
   855‚Üí        </div>
   856‚Üí      );
   857‚Üí    }
   858‚Üí
   859‚Üí    // Format display value
   860‚Üí    let displayValue = '';
   861‚Üí    if (column.type === 'boolean') {
   862‚Üí      displayValue = value === null || value === undefined ? '' : (value ? 'true' : 'false');
   863‚Üí    } else if (column.type === 'json') {
   864‚Üí      displayValue = value ? JSON.stringify(value) : '';
   865‚Üí    } else if (column.type === 'array') {
   866‚Üí      displayValue = value && Array.isArray(value) ? JSON.stringify(value) : (value ? String(value) : '');
   867‚Üí    } else if (column.type === 'timestamp') {
   868‚Üí      displayValue = value ? new Date(value as string).toLocaleString() : '';
   869‚Üí    } else if (column.type === 'date') {
   870‚Üí      displayValue = value ? new Date(value as string).toLocaleDateString() : '';
   871‚Üí    } else if (column.type === 'decimal') {
   872‚Üí      displayValue = value !== null && value !== undefined ? parseFloat(value as string).toFixed(2) : '';
   873‚Üí    } else {
   874‚Üí      displayValue = value?.toString() || '';
   875‚Üí    }
   876‚Üí
   877‚Üí    // Special handling for is_starred column to show clickable star
   878‚Üí    if (column.key === 'is_starred') {
   879‚Üí      const isStarred = value as boolean;
   880‚Üí      return (
   881‚Üí        <div className="flex items-center justify-center">
   882‚Üí          <div
   883‚Üí            onClick={() => toggleStar(item.url_id, isStarred)}
   884‚Üí            className="cursor-pointer hover:scale-110 transition-transform duration-200 p-1"
   885‚Üí            title={isStarred ? "Click to unstar" : "Click to star"}
   886‚Üí          >
   887‚Üí            <svg
   888‚Üí              width="16"
   889‚Üí              height="16"
   890‚Üí              viewBox="0 0 24 24"
   891‚Üí              className={isStarred ? "text-red-600" : "text-gray-400"}
   892‚Üí            >
   893‚Üí              <path
   894‚Üí                d="M12 2l3.09 6.26L22 9.27l-5 4.87 1.18 6.88L12 17.77l-6.18 3.25L7 14.14 2 9.27l6.91-1.01L12 2z"
   895‚Üí                fill={isStarred ? "currentColor" : "none"}
   896‚Üí                stroke="currentColor"
   897‚Üí                strokeWidth="1"
   898‚Üí                strokeLinejoin="round"
   899‚Üí              />
   900‚Üí            </svg>
   901‚Üí          </div>
   902‚Üí        </div>
   903‚Üí      );
   904‚Üí    }
   905‚Üí
   906‚Üí    // Special handling for is_commentable column to show visual indicator
   907‚Üí    if (column.key === 'is_commentable') {
   908‚Üí      const booleanValue = value as boolean;
   909‚Üí      return (
   910‚Üí        <div className="flex items-center gap-1">
   911‚Üí          <div
   912‚Üí            onClick={() => !isReadOnly && handleCellClick(item.url_id, column.key, value)}
   913‚Üí            className={`min-h-[1.25rem] px-2 py-0.5 rounded text-xs font-bold ${
   914‚Üí              !isReadOnly ? 'cursor-pointer hover:bg-gray-100' : 'cursor-default'
   915‚Üí            } ${booleanValue ? 'bg-green-100 text-green-800' : 'bg-red-100 text-red-800'} ${isReadOnly ? 'opacity-60' : ''}`}
   916‚Üí            style={{ whiteSpace: 'nowrap' }}
   917‚Üí            title={isReadOnly ? displayValue : `${displayValue} (Click to edit)`}
   918‚Üí          >
   919‚Üí            {booleanValue ? '‚úì Open' : '‚úó Closed'}
   920‚Üí          </div>
   921‚Üí        </div>
   922‚Üí      );
   923‚Üí    }
   924‚Üí
   925‚Üí    // Special handling for count_obls column to show EXP button
   926‚Üí    if (column.key === 'count_obls') {
   927‚Üí      return (
   928‚Üí        <div className="flex items-center gap-1">
   929‚Üí          <div
   930‚Üí            onClick={() => !isReadOnly && handleCellClick(item.url_id, column.key, value)}
   931‚Üí            className={`min-h-[1.25rem] px-1 py-0.5 rounded ${
   932‚Üí              !isReadOnly ? 'cursor-pointer hover:bg-gray-100' : 'cursor-default'
   933‚Üí            } ${isReadOnly ? 'text-gray-500' : ''}`}
   934‚Üí            style={{ whiteSpace: 'nowrap' }}
   935‚Üí            title={isReadOnly ? displayValue : `${displayValue} (Click to edit)`}
   936‚Üí          >
   937‚Üí            {displayValue}
   938‚Üí          </div>
   939‚Üí          <button
   940‚Üí            onClick={(e) => {
   941‚Üí              e.stopPropagation();
   942‚Üí              toggleRowExpansion(item.url_id);
   943‚Üí            }}
   944‚Üí            className="w-8 h-7 bg-gray-200 hover:bg-gray-300 text-gray-700 text-xs font-bold rounded transition-colors flex items-center justify-center"
   945‚Üí            style={{ fontSize: '10px' }}
   946‚Üí            title={expandedRows.has(item.url_id) ? 'Collapse outbound links' : 'Expand outbound links'}
   947‚Üí          >
   948‚Üí            EXP
   949‚Üí          </button>
   950‚Üí        </div>
   951‚Üí      );
   952‚Üí    }
   953‚Üí
   954‚Üí    // Special handling for url_datum column to show copy and open URL buttons
   955‚Üí    if (column.key === 'url_datum') {
   956‚Üí      // Create shortened display value for screen space
   957‚Üí      const shortenedDisplayValue = displayValue ? 
   958‚Üí        displayValue.replace(/^https:\/\/www\.reddit\.com/, '') : '';
   959‚Üí      
   960‚Üí      return (
   961‚Üí        <div className="flex items-center gap-1">
   962‚Üí          <button
   963‚Üí            onClick={(e) => {
   964‚Üí              e.stopPropagation();
   965‚Üí              if (displayValue) {
   966‚Üí                navigator.clipboard.writeText(displayValue);
   967‚Üí              }
   968‚Üí            }}
   969‚Üí            className="w-5 h-5 bg-gray-100 hover:bg-gray-200 text-gray-700 text-xs font-bold rounded transition-colors flex items-center justify-center"
   970‚Üí            style={{ fontSize: '10px' }}
   971‚Üí            title="Copy full URL to clipboard"
   972‚Üí          >
   973‚Üí            C
   974‚Üí          </button>
   975‚Üí          <a
   976‚Üí            href={displayValue || '#'}
   977‚Üí            target="_blank"
   978‚Üí            rel="noopener noreferrer"
   979‚Üí            onClick={(e) => {
   980‚Üí              e.stopPropagation();
   981‚Üí              if (!displayValue) {
   982‚Üí                e.preventDefault();
   983‚Üí              }
   984‚Üí            }}
   985‚Üí            onMouseDown={(e) => {
   986‚Üí              e.stopPropagation();
   987‚Üí            }}
   988‚Üí            className="w-5 h-5 bg-gray-600 hover:bg-gray-700 text-white text-xs rounded transition-colors flex items-center justify-center cursor-pointer no-underline"
   989‚Üí            title="Left-click: Open in new tab (switch to tab) | Middle-click: Open in background tab"
   990‚Üí          >
   991‚Üí            ‚Üí
   992‚Üí          </a>
   993‚Üí          <div
   994‚Üí            onClick={() => !isReadOnly && handleCellClick(item.url_id, column.key, value)}
   995‚Üí            className={`min-h-[1.25rem] px-1 py-0.5 rounded ${
   996‚Üí              !isReadOnly ? 'cursor-pointer hover:bg-gray-100' : 'cursor-default'
   997‚Üí            } ${isReadOnly ? 'text-gray-500' : ''}`}
   998‚Üí            style={{ whiteSpace: 'nowrap' }}
   999‚Üí            title={isReadOnly ? `Full URL: ${displayValue}` : `Full URL: ${displayValue} (Click to edit)`}
  1000‚Üí          >
  1001‚Üí            {shortenedDisplayValue}
  1002‚Üí          </div>
  1003‚Üí        </div>
  1004‚Üí      );
  1005‚Üí    }
  1006‚Üí
  1007‚Üí    return (
  1008‚Üí      <div
  1009‚Üí        onClick={() => !isReadOnly && handleCellClick(item.url_id, column.key, value)}
  1010‚Üí        className={`min-h-[1.25rem] px-1 py-0.5 rounded ${
  1011‚Üí          !isReadOnly ? 'cursor-pointer hover:bg-gray-100' : 'cursor-default'
  1012‚Üí        } ${isReadOnly ? 'text-gray-500' : ''}`}
  1013‚Üí        style={{ 
  1014‚Üí          whiteSpace: 'nowrap'
  1015‚Üí        }}
  1016‚Üí        title={isReadOnly ? displayValue : `${displayValue} (Click to edit)`}
  1017‚Üí      >
  1018‚Üí        {displayValue}
  1019‚Üí      </div>
  1020‚Üí    );
  1021‚Üí  };
  1022‚Üí
  1023‚Üí  if (loading) {
  1024‚Üí    return (
  1025‚Üí      <div className="min-h-screen flex items-center justify-center">
  1026‚Üí        <div className="text-xl">Loading Reddit URLs...</div>
  1027‚Üí      </div>
  1028‚Üí    );
  1029‚Üí  }
  1030‚Üí
  1031‚Üí  if (error) {
  1032‚Üí    return (
  1033‚Üí      <div className="min-h-screen flex items-center justify-center">
  1034‚Üí        <div className="text-xl text-red-600">Error: {error}</div>
  1035‚Üí      </div>
  1036‚Üí    );
  1037‚Üí  }
  1038‚Üí
  1039‚Üí  // Pagination component
  1040‚Üí  const PaginationControls = () => {
  1041‚Üí    if (totalPages <= 1) return null;
  1042‚Üí    
  1043‚Üí    return (
  1044‚Üí      <div className="flex items-center">
  1045‚Üí        <div className="flex items-center">
  1046‚Üí          <button
  1047‚Üí            onClick={() => {
  1048‚Üí              setItemsPerPage(10);
  1049‚Üí              setCurrentPage(1);
  1050‚Üí            }}
  1051‚Üí            className={`px-2 py-2.5 text-sm border rounded-l -mr-px cursor-pointer ${itemsPerPage === 10 ? 'text-black border-black' : 'bg-white hover:bg-gray-200'}`}
  1052‚Üí            style={{ fontSize: '14px', paddingTop: '10px', paddingBottom: '10px', backgroundColor: itemsPerPage === 10 ? '#f8f782' : undefined }}
  1053‚Üí          >
  1054‚Üí            10
  1055‚Üí          </button>
  1056‚Üí          <button
  1057‚Üí            onClick={() => {
  1058‚Üí              setItemsPerPage(20);
  1059‚Üí              setCurrentPage(1);
  1060‚Üí            }}
  1061‚Üí            className={`px-2 py-2.5 text-sm border -mr-px cursor-pointer ${itemsPerPage === 20 ? 'text-black border-black' : 'bg-white hover:bg-gray-200'}`}
  1062‚Üí            style={{ fontSize: '14px', paddingTop: '10px', paddingBottom: '10px', backgroundColor: itemsPerPage === 20 ? '#f8f782' : undefined }}
  1063‚Üí          >
  1064‚Üí            20
  1065‚Üí          </button>
  1066‚Üí          <button
  1067‚Üí            onClick={() => {
  1068‚Üí              setItemsPerPage(50);
  1069‚Üí              setCurrentPage(1);
  1070‚Üí            }}
  1071‚Üí            className={`px-2 py-2.5 text-sm border -mr-px cursor-pointer ${itemsPerPage === 50 ? 'text-black border-black' : 'bg-white hover:bg-gray-200'}`}
  1072‚Üí            style={{ fontSize: '14px', paddingTop: '10px', paddingBottom: '10px', backgroundColor: itemsPerPage === 50 ? '#f8f782' : undefined }}
  1073‚Üí          >
  1074‚Üí            50
  1075‚Üí          </button>
  1076‚Üí          <button
  1077‚Üí            onClick={() => {

  1136‚Üí            {Array.from({ length: Math.min(5, totalPages) }, (_, i) => {

  1386‚Üí                        {sortField === column.key && (

  1395‚Üí              </tr>
  1396‚Üí            </thead>
  1397‚Üí            <tbody className="divide-y divide-gray-200">
  1398‚Üí              {paginatedData.map((item) => (
  1399‚Üí                <>
  1400‚Üí                  <tr key={item.url_id} className="hover:bg-gray-50">
  1401‚Üí                    <td className="px-2 py-3 border border-gray-200">
  1402‚Üí                      <div 
  1403‚Üí                        className="w-full h-full cursor-pointer flex items-center justify-center"
  1404‚Üí                        onClick={(e) => {
  1405‚Üí                          const target = e.target as HTMLElement;
  1406‚Üí                          const checkbox = target.closest('td')?.querySelector('input[type="checkbox"]') as HTMLInputElement;
  1407‚Üí                          if (checkbox && target !== checkbox) {
  1408‚Üí                            checkbox.checked = !checkbox.checked;
  1409‚Üí                            checkbox.dispatchEvent(new Event('change'));
  1410‚Üí                          }
  1411‚Üí                        }}
  1412‚Üí                      >

  1417‚Üí                          onChange={(e) => {

  1420‚Üí                              if (e.target.checked) {
  1421‚Üí                                newSelected.add(item.url_id);
  1422‚Üí                              } else {
  1423‚Üí                                newSelected.delete(item.url_id);
  1424‚Üí                              }
  1425‚Üí                              onSelectionChange(newSelected);
  1426‚Üí                            }
  1427‚Üí                          }}
  1428‚Üí                        />
  1429‚Üí                      </div>
  1430‚Üí                    </td>
  1431‚Üí                    {visibleColumns.map((column, index) => {
  1432‚Üí                      const hasRightSeparator = column.separator === 'right';

  1434‚Üí                      const isOrgEntity = column.type === 'org_entity';
  1435‚Üí

  1439‚Üí                          <td

  1443‚Üí                          >
  1444‚Üí                          </td>
  1445‚Üí                        );
  1446‚Üí                      }
  1447‚Üí

  1449‚Üí                      if (isOrgEntity) {
  1450‚Üí                        const entityIcons = {
  1451‚Üí                          'org_starred': '‚≠ê',
  1452‚Üí                          'org_flagged': 'üö©',
  1453‚Üí                          'org_squared': '‚¨ú',
  1454‚Üí                          'org_circled': '‚≠ï',
  1455‚Üí                          'org_triangled': 'üî∫'
  1456‚Üí                        };
  1457‚Üí                        
  1458‚Üí                        const entityTypeMap = {
  1459‚Üí                          'org_starred': 'is_starred' as const,
  1460‚Üí                          'org_flagged': 'is_flagged' as const,
  1461‚Üí                          'org_squared': 'is_squared' as const,
  1462‚Üí                          'org_circled': 'is_circled' as const,
  1463‚Üí                          'org_triangled': 'is_triangled' as const
  1464‚Üí                        };
  1465‚Üí                        
  1466‚Üí                        const entityType = entityTypeMap[column.key as keyof typeof entityTypeMap];
  1467‚Üí                        const isActive = hasEntity(item.url_id, entityType);
  1468‚Üí                        
  1469‚Üí                        return (
  1470‚Üí                          <td
  1471‚Üí                            key={column.key}
  1472‚Üí                            className="text-center border border-gray-200 cursor-pointer hover:bg-gray-100"
  1473‚Üí                            style={{ 
  1474‚Üí                              width: '20px', 
  1475‚Üí                              padding: '2px',
  1476‚Üí                              minWidth: '20px',
  1477‚Üí                              maxWidth: '20px',
  1478‚Üí                              whiteSpace: 'nowrap'
  1479‚Üí                            }}
  1480‚Üí                            onClick={() => {
  1481‚Üí                              toggleEntity(item.url_id, entityType);
  1482‚Üí                            }}
  1483‚Üí                          >
  1484‚Üí                            <div className="flex items-center justify-center">
  1485‚Üí                              <span style={{ 
  1486‚Üí                                fontSize: '12px', 
  1487‚Üí                                opacity: isActive ? 1 : 0.3,
  1488‚Üí                                transition: 'opacity 0.2s ease'
  1489‚Üí                              }}>
  1490‚Üí                                {entityIcons[column.key as keyof typeof entityIcons]}
  1491‚Üí                              </span>
  1492‚Üí                            </div>
  1493‚Üí                          </td>
  1494‚Üí                        );
  1495‚Üí                      }
  1496‚Üí                      
  1497‚Üí                      return (
  1498‚Üí                        <td
  1499‚Üí                          key={column.key}
  1500‚Üí                          className={`text-sm border border-gray-200 px-2 py-1 ${

  1504‚Üí                            whiteSpace: 'nowrap'
  1505‚Üí                          }}
  1506‚Üí                        >
  1507‚Üí                          {renderCell(item, column)}
  1508‚Üí                        </td>
  1509‚Üí                      );
  1510‚Üí                    })}
  1511‚Üí                  </tr>
  1512‚Üí                  
  1513‚Üí                  {/* Expanded row for outbound links */}
  1514‚Üí                  {expandedRows.has(item.url_id) && (

  1519‚Üí                            Outbound Links
  1520‚Üí                          </h3>

    42‚Üí    const ptab7 = urlParams.get('ptab7');
    43‚Üí    
    44‚Üí    // Auto-open popup if fpop=open is in URL
    45‚Üí    if (fpop === 'open') {
    46‚Üí      setIsPopupOpen(true);
    47‚Üí      
    48‚Üí      // Set active tab based on URL parameters
    49‚Üí      if (ptab1 === 'active') {
    50‚Üí        setActivePopupTab('ptab1');
    51‚Üí      } else if (ptab2 === 'active') {
    52‚Üí        setActivePopupTab('ptab2');
    53‚Üí      } else if (ptab3 === 'active') {
    54‚Üí        setActivePopupTab('ptab3');
    55‚Üí      } else if (ptab4 === 'active') {
    56‚Üí        setActivePopupTab('ptab4');
    57‚Üí      } else if (ptab5 === 'active') {
    58‚Üí        setActivePopupTab('ptab5');
    59‚Üí      } else if (ptab6 === 'active') {
    60‚Üí        setActivePopupTab('ptab6');
    61‚Üí      } else if (ptab7 === 'active') {
    62‚Üí        setActivePopupTab('ptab7');
    63‚Üí      }
    64‚Üí    }
    65‚Üí  }, []);
    66‚Üí
    67‚Üí  useEffect(() => {
    68‚Üí    const fetchNwpiContent = async () => {
    69‚Üí      if (!user?.id) {
    70‚Üí        setLoading(false);
    71‚Üí        return;
    72‚Üí      }
    73‚Üí
    74‚Üí      try {
    75‚Üí        // First get the internal user ID
    76‚Üí        const { data: userData } = await supabase
    77‚Üí          .from('users')
    78‚Üí          .select('id')
    79‚Üí          .eq('auth_id', user.id)
    80‚Üí          .single();
    81‚Üí
    82‚Üí        if (!userData) {
    83‚Üí          setError('User not found');
    84‚Üí          setLoading(false);
    85‚Üí          return;
    86‚Üí        }
    87‚Üí
    88‚Üí        // Fetch nwpi_content data for this user
    89‚Üí        const { data: nwpiContent, error: contentError } = await supabase
    90‚Üí          .from('nwpi_content')
    91‚Üí          .select('*')
    92‚Üí          .eq('fk_users_id', userData.id)
    93‚Üí          .order('i_sync_completed_at', { ascending: false });
    94‚Üí
    95‚Üí        if (contentError) {
    96‚Üí          console.error('Error fetching nwpi_content:', contentError);
    97‚Üí          setError('Error fetching content');
    98‚Üí        } else {
    99‚Üí          setNwpiContent(nwpiContent || []);
   100‚Üí        }
   101‚Üí      } catch (err) {
   102‚Üí        console.error('Error:', err);
   103‚Üí        setError('An error occurred');
   104‚Üí      } finally {
   105‚Üí        setLoading(false);
   106‚Üí      }
   107‚Üí    };
   108‚Üí
   109‚Üí    fetchNwpiContent();
   110‚Üí  }, [user?.id, supabase]);
   111‚Üí
   112‚Üí  // Fetch custom colors for uelbar37 and uelbar38
   113‚Üí  useEffect(() => {
   114‚Üí    const fetchUelBarColors = async () => {
   115‚Üí      try {
   116‚Üí        const { data, error } = await supabase
   117‚Üí          .from('custom_colors')
   118‚Üí          .select('color_ref_code, hex_value')
   119‚Üí          .in('color_ref_code', ['uelbar38_bgcolor1', 'uelbar38_textcolor1', 'uelbar37_bgcolor1', 'uelbar37_textcolor1']);
   120‚Üí
   121‚Üí        console.log('Custom colors query result:', { data, error });
   122‚Üí
   123‚Üí        if (!error && data && data.length > 0) {
   124‚Üí          // uelbar38 colors
   125‚Üí          const bgColor38Item = data.find(item => item.color_ref_code === 'uelbar38_bgcolor1');
   126‚Üí          const textColor38Item = data.find(item => item.color_ref_code === 'uelbar38_textcolor1');
   127‚Üí          
   128‚Üí          const bgColor38 = bgColor38Item?.hex_value || '#2563eb';
   129‚Üí          const textColor38 = textColor38Item?.hex_value || '#ffffff';
   130‚Üí          
   131‚Üí          console.log('uelbar38 colors:', { bgColor38, textColor38 });
   132‚Üí          setUelBarColors({bg: bgColor38, text: textColor38});
   133‚Üí
   134‚Üí          // uelbar37 colors
   135‚Üí          const bgColor37Item = data.find(item => item.color_ref_code === 'uelbar37_bgcolor1');
   136‚Üí          const textColor37Item = data.find(item => item.color_ref_code === 'uelbar37_textcolor1');
   137‚Üí          
   138‚Üí          const bgColor37 = bgColor37Item?.hex_value || '#1e40af';
   139‚Üí          const textColor37 = textColor37Item?.hex_value || '#ffffff';
   140‚Üí          
   141‚Üí          console.log('uelbar37 colors:', { bgColor37, textColor37 });
   142‚Üí          setUelBar37Colors({bg: bgColor37, text: textColor37});
   143‚Üí        } else {
   144‚Üí          console.log('No custom colors found, using defaults');
   145‚Üí        }
   146‚Üí      } catch (err) {
   147‚Üí        console.error('Error fetching uel bar colors:', err);
   148‚Üí      }
   149‚Üí    };
   150‚Üí
   151‚Üí    fetchUelBarColors();
   152‚Üí  }, [supabase]);
   153‚Üí
   154‚Üí  // Track URL changes for uelbar37 display
   155‚Üí  useEffect(() => {
   156‚Üí    // Set initial URL
   157‚Üí    setCurrentUrl(window.location.href);
   158‚Üí    
   159‚Üí    // Listen for URL changes (for pushState/replaceState)
   160‚Üí    const handleUrlChange = () => {
   161‚Üí      setCurrentUrl(window.location.href);
   162‚Üí    };
   163‚Üí    
   164‚Üí    // Listen for popstate events (back/forward buttons)
   165‚Üí    window.addEventListener('popstate', handleUrlChange);
   166‚Üí    
   167‚Üí    // Create a MutationObserver to watch for URL changes via pushState/replaceState
   168‚Üí    const observer = new MutationObserver(() => {
   169‚Üí      if (window.location.href !== currentUrl) {
   170‚Üí        setCurrentUrl(window.location.href);
   171‚Üí      }
   172‚Üí    });
   173‚Üí    
   174‚Üí    // Watch for changes to the document that might indicate URL changes
   175‚Üí    observer.observe(document, { subtree: true, childList: true });
   176‚Üí    
   177‚Üí    // Custom event listener for our URL updates
   178‚Üí    const handleCustomUrlUpdate = () => {
   179‚Üí      setCurrentUrl(window.location.href);
   180‚Üí    };
   181‚Üí    window.addEventListener('urlchange', handleCustomUrlUpdate);
   182‚Üí    
   183‚Üí    return () => {
   184‚Üí      window.removeEventListener('popstate', handleUrlChange);
   185‚Üí      window.removeEventListener('urlchange', handleCustomUrlUpdate);
   186‚Üí      observer.disconnect();
   187‚Üí    };
   188‚Üí  }, [currentUrl]);
   189‚Üí
   190‚Üí  if (!user) {
   191‚Üí    return (
   192‚Üí      <div className="pr-4">
   193‚Üí        <div className="text-center">
   194‚Üí          <p>Please sign in to view your synced content.</p>
   195‚Üí        </div>
   196‚Üí      </div>
   197‚Üí    );
   198‚Üí  }
   199‚Üí
   200‚Üí  if (loading) {
   201‚Üí    return (
   202‚Üí      <div className="pr-4">
   203‚Üí        <div className="text-center">
   204‚Üí          <p>Loading synced content...</p>
   205‚Üí        </div>
   206‚Üí      </div>
   207‚Üí    );
   208‚Üí  }
   209‚Üí
   210‚Üí  if (error) {
   211‚Üí    return (
   212‚Üí      <div className="pr-4">
   213‚Üí        <div className="text-center text-red-600">
   214‚Üí          <p>Error: {error}</p>
   215‚Üí        </div>
   216‚Üí      </div>
   217‚Üí    );
   218‚Üí  }
   219‚Üí
   220‚Üí  // Get current sitebase from URL
   221‚Üí  const currentSitebase = searchParams?.get('sitebase');
   222‚Üí  const hasSitebase = Boolean(currentSitebase);
   223‚Üí
   224‚Üí  // Handle checkbox clicks with mutual exclusivity
   225‚Üí  const handleKz101Click = () => {
   226‚Üí    setKz101Checked(true);
   227‚Üí    setKz103Checked(false);
   228‚Üí  };
   229‚Üí
   230‚Üí  const handleKz103Click = () => {
   231‚Üí    setKz103Checked(true);
   232‚Üí    setKz101Checked(false);
   233‚Üí  };
   234‚Üí
   235‚Üí  // Update URL parameters for popup state
   236‚Üí  const updatePopupURL = (fpopOpen: boolean, tabActive?: string) => {
   237‚Üí    const url = new URL(window.location.href);
   238‚Üí    
   239‚Üí    if (fpopOpen) {
   240‚Üí      url.searchParams.set('fpop', 'open');
   241‚Üí      
   242‚Üí      // Clear all tab parameters first
   243‚Üí      ['ptab1', 'ptab2', 'ptab3', 'ptab4', 'ptab5', 'ptab6', 'ptab7'].forEach(tab => {
   244‚Üí        url.searchParams.delete(tab);
   245‚Üí      });
   246‚Üí      
   247‚Üí      // Set the active tab parameter
   248‚Üí      if (tabActive) {
   249‚Üí        url.searchParams.set(tabActive, 'active');
   250‚Üí      } else {
   251‚Üí        // Default to ptab1 if no specific tab provided
   252‚Üí        url.searchParams.set('ptab1', 'active');
   253‚Üí      }
   254‚Üí    } else {
   255‚Üí      // Remove popup and all tab parameters when popup is closed
   256‚Üí      url.searchParams.delete('fpop');
   257‚Üí      ['ptab1', 'ptab2', 'ptab3', 'ptab4', 'ptab5', 'ptab6', 'ptab7'].forEach(tab => {
   258‚Üí        url.searchParams.delete(tab);
   259‚Üí      });
   260‚Üí    }
   261‚Üí    
   262‚Üí    // Update URL without triggering page reload
   263‚Üí    window.history.replaceState({}, '', url.toString());
   264‚Üí    
   265‚Üí    // Trigger custom event to update our URL display
   266‚Üí    window.dispatchEvent(new Event('urlchange'));
   267‚Üí  };
   268‚Üí
   269‚Üí  // Handle popup open/close with URL updates
   270‚Üí  const handlePopupOpen = () => {
   271‚Üí    setIsPopupOpen(true);
   272‚Üí    
   273‚Üí    // Set default selection if neither option is selected
   274‚Üí    if (!kz101Checked && !kz103Checked) {
   275‚Üí      setKz101Checked(true);
   276‚Üí    }
   277‚Üí    
   278‚Üí    // Check if URL has specific tab parameter
   279‚Üí    const urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);
   280‚Üí    const hasTabInUrl = ['ptab1', 'ptab2', 'ptab3', 'ptab4', 'ptab5', 'ptab6', 'ptab7']
   281‚Üí      .some(tab => urlParams.get(tab) === 'active');
   282‚Üí    
   283‚Üí    if (!hasTabInUrl) {
   284‚Üí      // No tab specified in URL, use last remembered tab from localStorage
   285‚Üí      const lastTab = localStorage.getItem('nwjar1_lastActiveTab') || 'ptab1';
   286‚Üí      setActivePopupTab(lastTab as any);
   287‚Üí      updatePopupURL(true, lastTab);
   288‚Üí    } else {
   289‚Üí      // URL has tab specified, use current activePopupTab
   290‚Üí      updatePopupURL(true, activePopupTab);
   291‚Üí    }
   292‚Üí  };
   293‚Üí
   294‚Üí  const handlePopupClose = () => {
   295‚Üí    setIsPopupOpen(false);
   296‚Üí    updatePopupURL(false);
   297‚Üí  };
   298‚Üí
   299‚Üí  // Handle tab changes with URL updates and localStorage
   300‚Üí  const handleTabChange = (tab: string) => {
   301‚Üí    setActivePopupTab(tab as any);
   302‚Üí    localStorage.setItem('nwjar1_lastActiveTab', tab); // Remember this tab for next time
   303‚Üí    updatePopupURL(true, tab);
   304‚Üí  };
   305‚Üí
   306‚Üí  // f22_nwpi_to_gcon_pusher handler
   307‚Üí  const handleF22NwpiToGconPusher = async () => {
   308‚Üí    let itemsToProcess: string[] = [];
   309‚Üí    
   310‚Üí    if (kz101Checked) {
   311‚Üí      // SOPTION1: Use selected items
   312‚Üí      if (selectedContentIds.size === 0) {
   313‚Üí        alert('Please select at least one item from the table');
   314‚Üí        return;
   315‚Üí      }
   316‚Üí      itemsToProcess = Array.from(selectedContentIds);
   317‚Üí    } else if (kz103Checked) {
   318‚Üí      // SOPTION2: Push all items in current view
   319‚Üí      itemsToProcess = nwpiContent.map(item => item.internal_post_id);
   320‚Üí    } else {
   321‚Üí      alert('Please select SOPTION1 or SOPTION2 first');
   322‚Üí      return;
   323‚Üí    }
   324‚Üí
   325‚Üí    setF22Loading(true);
   326‚Üí    setF22Error(null); // Clear previous errors
   327‚Üí    setF22Report(''); // Clear previous reports
   328‚Üí    try {
   329‚Üí      const response = await fetch('/api/f22-nwpi-to-gcon-pusher', {
   330‚Üí        method: 'POST',
   331‚Üí        headers: {
   332‚Üí          'Content-Type': 'application/json',
   333‚Üí        },
   334‚Üí        body: JSON.stringify({
   335‚Üí          recordIds: itemsToProcess
   336‚Üí        }),
   337‚Üí      });
   338‚Üí
   339‚Üí      // Check if response is ok before parsing JSON
   340‚Üí      if (!response.ok) {
   341‚Üí        throw new Error(`Server error: ${response.status} ${response.statusText}`);
   342‚Üí      }
   343‚Üí
   344‚Üí      // Get response text first to check if it's empty
   345‚Üí      const responseText = await response.text();
   346‚Üí      if (!responseText.trim()) {
   347‚Üí        throw new Error('Empty response from server');
   348‚Üí      }
   349‚Üí
   350‚Üí      // Try to parse JSON
   351‚Üí      let result;
   352‚Üí      try {
   353‚Üí        result = JSON.parse(responseText);
   354‚Üí      } catch (jsonError) {
   355‚Üí        const debugInfo = {
   356‚Üí          jsonError: jsonError instanceof Error ? jsonError.message : 'Unknown JSON error',
   357‚Üí          responseStatus: response.status,
   358‚Üí          responseText: responseText.substring(0, 500)
   359‚Üí        };
   360‚Üí        console.error('JSON parsing error:', debugInfo);
   361‚Üí        throw new Error(`Invalid JSON response from server.\n\nDebug Info:\n- Status: ${response.status}\n- JSON Error: ${debugInfo.jsonError}\n- Response: "${responseText.substring(0, 200)}..."`);
   362‚Üí      }
   363‚Üí
   364‚Üí      // Add debug logging
   365‚Üí      console.log('üîç F22 API Response:', result);
   366‚Üí      
   367‚Üí      if (result.success) {
   368‚Üí        // Create comprehensive success report for popup display
   369‚Üí        const successReport = `‚úÖ F22 PROCESSING COMPLETED SUCCESSFULLY
   370‚Üí
   371‚ÜíExecution Summary:
   372‚Üí- Processed: ${result.results?.processed || 0} records
   373‚Üí- Succeeded: ${result.results?.succeeded || 0} records  
   374‚Üí- Failed: ${result.results?.failed || 0} records
   375‚Üí- Message: ${result.message}
   376‚Üí
   377‚ÜíAPI Results:
   378‚Üí- Endpoint: /api/f22-nwpi-to-gcon-pusher
   379‚Üí- Response Time: ${new Date().toISOString()}
   380‚Üí- Selected Items: ${kz101Checked ? selectedContentIds.size : (kz103Checked ? nwpiContent.length : 0)}
   381‚Üí
   382‚ÜíProcessing Results:
   383‚Üí‚úì BozoHTMLNormalizationProcess1: HTML content normalized to plaintext
   384‚Üí‚úì TontoNormalizationProcess1: Text split by linebreaks (\\n)
   385‚Üí‚úì mud_content: Reconstructed and updated in gcon_pieces
   386‚Üí‚úì mud_title: Title field updated in gcon_pieces
   387‚Üí‚úì mud_deplines: Line-by-line entries created with HTML tag detection
   388‚Üí‚úì aval_dorlis: Complex HTML blocks extracted and stored with placeholders
   389‚Üí
   390‚ÜíDatabase Operations:
   391‚Üí- gcon_pieces table: mud_content, mud_title, and aval_content updated
   392‚Üí- mud_deplines table: Previous entries deleted, new entries inserted
   393‚Üí- aval_dorlis table: Previous dorli blocks cleared, new blocks stored
   394‚Üí
   395‚ÜíDebug Information:
   396‚Üí- Check browser console (F12) for üîç DEBUG messages about mud_title and mud_content
   397‚Üí- Full Response: ${JSON.stringify(result, null, 2)}
   398‚Üí- Errors: ${result.results?.errors?.length || 0} errors logged
   399‚Üí
   400‚ÜíSystem Status: All operations completed successfully`;
   401‚Üí
   402‚Üí        setF22Report(successReport); // Store in popup instead of alert
   403‚Üí        setF22Error(null); // Clear any previous errors on success
   404‚Üí      } else {
   405‚Üí        const errorMessage = result.message || 'Failed to push to GCon pieces';
   406‚Üí        console.error('üö® F22 API returned error:', result);
   407‚Üí        
   408‚Üí        // Create comprehensive error report
   409‚Üí        const errorReport = `‚ùå F22 PROCESSING FAILED
   410‚Üí
   411‚ÜíError Details:
   412‚Üí- Message: ${errorMessage}
   413‚Üí- Processed: ${result.results?.processed || 0} records
   414‚Üí- Succeeded: ${result.results?.succeeded || 0} records
   415‚Üí- Failed: ${result.results?.failed || 0} records
   416‚Üí
   417‚ÜíAPI Information:
   418‚Üí- Endpoint: /api/f22-nwpi-to-gcon-pusher
   419‚Üí- Timestamp: ${new Date().toISOString()}
   420‚Üí- Selected Items: ${kz101Checked ? selectedContentIds.size : (kz103Checked ? nwpiContent.length : 0)}
   421‚Üí
   422‚Üí${result.results?.errors?.length > 0 ? `
   423‚ÜíSpecific Errors (${result.results.errors.length}):
   424‚Üí${result.results.errors.map((error: string, i: number) => `${i + 1}. ${error}`).join('\n')}
   425‚Üí` : ''}
   426‚Üí
   427‚ÜíDebug Information:
   428‚Üí- Check browser console (F12) for üîç DEBUG messages
   429‚Üí- Full API Response: ${JSON.stringify(result, null, 2)}
   430‚Üí
   431‚ÜíSystem Status: Processing halted due to errors
   432‚ÜíRecommendation: Check logs and retry operation`;
   433‚Üí
   434‚Üí        alert(errorReport);
   435‚Üí        setF22Error({
   436‚Üí          message: errorMessage,
   437‚Üí          details: {
   438‚Üí            apiResponse: result,
   439‚Üí            debugInfo: result.debugInfo,
   440‚Üí            results: result.results,
   441‚Üí            timestamp: new Date().toISOString(),
   442‚Üí            endpoint: '/api/f22-nwpi-to-gcon-pusher',
   443‚Üí            selectedItems: kz101Checked ? selectedContentIds.size : (kz103Checked ? nwpiContent.length : 0)
   444‚Üí          }
   445‚Üí        });
   446‚Üí      }
   447‚Üí    } catch (error) {
   448‚Üí      console.error('üö® Error calling f22_nwpi_to_gcon_pusher:', error);
   449‚Üí      const errorMessage = 'An error occurred while pushing to GCon pieces';
   450‚Üí      
   451‚Üí      // Create comprehensive client error report
   452‚Üí      const clientErrorReport = `‚ùå F22 CLIENT ERROR
   453‚Üí
   454‚ÜíError Details:
   455‚Üí- Type: Network/Client Error
   456‚Üí- Message: ${error instanceof Error ? error.message : 'Unknown error occurred'}
   457‚Üí- Timestamp: ${new Date().toISOString()}
   458‚Üí
   459‚ÜíRequest Information:
   460‚Üí- Endpoint: POST /api/f22-nwpi-to-gcon-pusher
   461‚Üí- Selected Items: ${kz101Checked ? selectedContentIds.size : (kz103Checked ? nwpiContent.length : 0)}
   462‚Üí- Request Mode: ${kz101Checked ? 'SOPTION1 (Selected)' : 'SOPTION2 (All)'}
   463‚Üí
   464‚ÜíError Stack:
   465‚Üí${error instanceof Error && error.stack ? error.stack : 'No stack trace available'}
   466‚Üí
   467‚ÜíDebug Information:
   468‚Üí- Check browser console (F12) for detailed error logs
   469‚Üí- Check network tab for failed requests
   470‚Üí- Verify API endpoint is accessible
   471‚Üí
   472‚ÜíSystem Status: Request failed before reaching server
   473‚ÜíRecommendation: Check network connection and API availability`;
   474‚Üí
   475‚Üí      alert(clientErrorReport);
   476‚Üí      setF22Error({
   477‚Üí        message: errorMessage,
   478‚Üí        details: {
   479‚Üí          clientError: error instanceof Error ? {
   480‚Üí            name: error.name,
   481‚Üí            message: error.message,
   482‚Üí            stack: error.stack
   483‚Üí          } : error,
   484‚Üí          timestamp: new Date().toISOString(),
   485‚Üí          endpoint: '/api/f22-nwpi-to-gcon-pusher',
   486‚Üí          selectedItems: kz101Checked ? selectedContentIds.size : (kz103Checked ? nwpiContent.length : 0),
   487‚Üí          userAgent: navigator.userAgent,
   488‚Üí          url: window.location.href
   489‚Üí        }
   490‚Üí      });
   491‚Üí    } finally {
   492‚Üí      setF22Loading(false);
   493‚Üí    }
   494‚Üí  };
   495‚Üí
   496‚Üí  // f47_generate_gcon_pieces handler
   497‚Üí  const handleF47GenerateGconPieces = async () => {
   498‚Üí    let itemsToProcess: string[] = [];
   499‚Üí    
   500‚Üí    if (kz101Checked) {
   501‚Üí      // SOPTION1: Use selected items
   502‚Üí      if (selectedContentIds.size === 0) {
   503‚Üí        alert('Please select at least one item from the table');
   504‚Üí        return;
   505‚Üí      }
   506‚Üí      itemsToProcess = Array.from(selectedContentIds);
   507‚Üí    } else if (kz103Checked) {
   508‚Üí      // SOPTION2: Use all items in current filtered data
   509‚Üí      itemsToProcess = nwpiContent.map(item => item.internal_post_id);
   510‚Üí    } else {
   511‚Üí      alert('Please select either SOPTION1 or SOPTION2');
   512‚Üí      return;
   513‚Üí    }
   514‚Üí
   515‚Üí    if (itemsToProcess.length === 0) {
   516‚Üí      alert('No items to process');
   517‚Üí      return;
   518‚Üí    }
   519‚Üí
   520‚Üí    setF47Loading(true);
   521‚Üí    setF47Error(null); // Clear previous errors
   522‚Üí    try {
   523‚Üí      const response = await fetch('/api/f47_generate_gcon_pieces', {
   524‚Üí        method: 'POST',
   525‚Üí        headers: {
   526‚Üí          'Content-Type': 'application/json',
   527‚Üí        },
   528‚Üí        body: JSON.stringify({
   529‚Üí          internal_post_ids: itemsToProcess
   530‚Üí        }),
   531‚Üí      });
   532‚Üí
   533‚Üí      const result = await response.json();
   534‚Üí
   535‚Üí      if (result.success) {
   536‚Üí        alert(`Successfully generated ${result.data.created_count} GCon pieces from ${itemsToProcess.length} items`);
   537‚Üí        setF47Error(null); // Clear any previous errors on success
   538‚Üí        // Could refresh data or show more detailed results here
   539‚Üí      } else {
   540‚Üí        const errorMessage = result.error || 'Failed to generate GCon pieces';
   541‚Üí        alert(`Error: ${errorMessage}`);
   542‚Üí        setF47Error({
   543‚Üí          message: errorMessage,
   544‚Üí          details: result.data || result
   545‚Üí        });
   546‚Üí      }
   547‚Üí    } catch (error) {
   548‚Üí      console.error('Error calling f47_generate_gcon_pieces:', error);
   549‚Üí      const errorMessage = 'An error occurred while generating GCon pieces';
   550‚Üí      alert(errorMessage);
   551‚Üí      setF47Error({
   552‚Üí        message: errorMessage,
   553‚Üí        details: error instanceof Error ? {
   554‚Üí          name: error.name,
   555‚Üí          message: error.message,
   556‚Üí          stack: error.stack
   557‚Üí        } : error
   558‚Üí      });
   559‚Üí    } finally {
   560‚Üí      setF47Loading(false);
   561‚Üí    }
   562‚Üí  };
   563‚Üí
   564‚Üí  return (
   565‚Üí    <div className="pr-4">
   566‚Üí      <div className="mb-8 flex items-center" style={{ gap: '16px' }}>
   567‚Üí        <button
   568‚Üí          onClick={handlePopupOpen}
   569‚Üí          className="font-bold text-white rounded"
   570‚Üí          style={{
   571‚Üí            backgroundColor: '#800000', // maroon color
   572‚Üí            fontSize: '20px',
   573‚Üí            paddingLeft: '14px',
   574‚Üí            paddingRight: '14px',
   575‚Üí            paddingTop: '10px',
   576‚Üí            paddingBottom: '10px'
   577‚Üí          }}
   578‚Üí        >
   579‚Üí          functions popup
   580‚Üí        </button>
   581‚Üí        
   582‚Üí        {/* Go Forward Button */}
   583‚Üí        {hasSitebase && currentSitebase ? (
   584‚Üí          <Link
   585‚Üí            href={`/gconjar1?coltemp=option1&sitebase=${encodeURIComponent(currentSitebase)}`}
   586‚Üí            className="font-bold text-gray-600 rounded hover:bg-gray-300 transition-colors"
   587‚Üí            style={{
   588‚Üí              backgroundColor: '#e5e7eb', // light gray
   589‚Üí              fontSize: '20px',
   590‚Üí              paddingLeft: '14px',
   591‚Üí              paddingRight: '14px',
   592‚Üí              paddingTop: '10px',
   593‚Üí              paddingBottom: '10px',
   594‚Üí              textDecoration: 'none'
   595‚Üí            }}
   596‚Üí          >
   597‚Üí            &gt;&gt; Go Forward To /gconjar1
   598‚Üí          </Link>
   599‚Üí        ) : (
   600‚Üí          <button
   601‚Üí            disabled
   602‚Üí            className="font-bold text-gray-400 rounded cursor-not-allowed opacity-50"
   603‚Üí            style={{
   604‚Üí              backgroundColor: '#f3f4f6', // lighter gray for disabled
   605‚Üí              fontSize: '20px',
   606‚Üí              paddingLeft: '14px',
   607‚Üí              paddingRight: '14px',
   608‚Üí              paddingTop: '10px',
   609‚Üí              paddingBottom: '10px'
   610‚Üí            }}
   611‚Üí          >
   612‚Üí            &gt;&gt; Go Forward To /gconjar1
   613‚Üí          </button>
   614‚Üí        )}
   615‚Üí      </div>
   616‚Üí
   617‚Üí      {/* Popup Modal */}
   618‚Üí      {isPopupOpen && (
   619‚Üí        <div className="fixed inset-0 z-50 overflow-auto bg-black bg-opacity-50 flex items-center justify-center p-4">
   620‚Üí          <div className="bg-white w-full h-full max-w-[95vw] max-h-[95vh] rounded-lg shadow-xl relative overflow-hidden">
   621‚Üí            {/* uelbar37 header bar */}
   622‚Üí            <div 
   623‚Üí              className="absolute top-0 left-0 right-0 flex items-center px-4"
   624‚Üí              style={{ 
   625‚Üí                height: '50px',
   626‚Üí                backgroundColor: uelBar37Colors.bg,
   627‚Üí                color: uelBar37Colors.text
   628‚Üí              }}
   629‚Üí            >
   630‚Üí              <span className="font-semibold">BROWSER URL</span>
   631‚Üí              
   632‚Üí              {/* Vertical separator */}
   633‚Üí              <div 
   634‚Üí                className="bg-gray-600"
   635‚Üí                style={{
   636‚Üí                  width: '3px',
   637‚Üí                  height: '100%',
   638‚Üí                  marginLeft: '30px',
   639‚Üí                  marginRight: '30px'
   640‚Üí                }}
   641‚Üí              />
   642‚Üí              
   643‚Üí              <span className="font-mono text-sm overflow-hidden whitespace-nowrap text-ellipsis flex-1">
   644‚Üí                {(() => {
   645‚Üí                  // Parse URL to highlight sitebase parameter
   646‚Üí                  try {
   647‚Üí                    const url = new URL(currentUrl);
   648‚Üí                    const sitebaseParam = url.searchParams.get('sitebase');
   649‚Üí                    
   650‚Üí                    if (sitebaseParam) {
   651‚Üí                      const fullUrl = currentUrl;
   652‚Üí                      const sitebaseText = `sitebase=${sitebaseParam}`;
   653‚Üí                      const parts = fullUrl.split(sitebaseText);
   654‚Üí                      
   655‚Üí                      if (parts.length === 2) {
   656‚Üí                        return (
   657‚Üí                          <>
   658‚Üí                            {parts[0]}
   659‚Üí                            <span style={{ fontWeight: 'bold', color: '#ff9e71' }}>
   660‚Üí                              {sitebaseText}
   661‚Üí                            </span>
   662‚Üí                            {parts[1]}
   663‚Üí                          </>
   664‚Üí                        );
   665‚Üí                      }
   666‚Üí                    }
   667‚Üí                    
   668‚Üí                    return currentUrl;
   669‚Üí                  } catch (error) {
   670‚Üí                    return currentUrl;
   671‚Üí                  }
   672‚Üí                })()}
   673‚Üí              </span>
   674‚Üí
   675‚Üí              {/* Copy buttons in uelbar37 - positioned to the left of close button */}
   676‚Üí              <button
   677‚Üí                onClick={() => {
   678‚Üí                  navigator.clipboard.writeText(currentUrl);
   679‚Üí                }}
   680‚Üí                className="bg-gray-600 text-white font-bold flex items-center justify-center hover:bg-gray-700 transition-colors"
   681‚Üí                style={{
   682‚Üí                  width: '80px',
   683‚Üí                  height: '50px',
   684‚Üí                  marginRight: '0px',
   685‚Üí                  fontSize: '10px',

   688‚Üí                }}
   689‚Üí                title="Copy Full URL"
   690‚Üí              >

   692‚Üí              </button>

   207‚Üí  // Track URL changes for uelbar37 display
   208‚Üí  useEffect(() => {
   209‚Üí    // Set initial URL
   210‚Üí    setCurrentUrl(window.location.href);
   211‚Üí    
   212‚Üí    // Listen for URL changes (for pushState/replaceState)
   213‚Üí    const handleUrlChange = () => {
   214‚Üí      setCurrentUrl(window.location.href);
   215‚Üí    };
   216‚Üí    
   217‚Üí    // Listen for popstate events (back/forward buttons)
   218‚Üí    window.addEventListener('popstate', handleUrlChange);
   219‚Üí    
   220‚Üí    // Create a MutationObserver to watch for URL changes via pushState/replaceState
   221‚Üí    const observer = new MutationObserver(() => {
   222‚Üí      if (window.location.href !== currentUrl) {
   223‚Üí        setCurrentUrl(window.location.href);
   224‚Üí      }
   225‚Üí    });
   226‚Üí    
   227‚Üí    // Watch for changes to the document that might indicate URL changes
   228‚Üí    observer.observe(document, { subtree: true, childList: true });
   229‚Üí    
   230‚Üí    // Custom event listener for our URL updates
   231‚Üí    const handleCustomUrlUpdate = () => {
   232‚Üí      setCurrentUrl(window.location.href);
   233‚Üí    };
   234‚Üí    window.addEventListener('urlchange', handleCustomUrlUpdate);
   235‚Üí    
   236‚Üí    return () => {
   237‚Üí      window.removeEventListener('popstate', handleUrlChange);
   238‚Üí      window.removeEventListener('urlchange', handleCustomUrlUpdate);
   239‚Üí      observer.disconnect();
   240‚Üí    };
   241‚Üí  }, [currentUrl]);
   242‚Üí
   243‚Üí  useEffect(() => {
   244‚Üí    if (!user) {
   245‚Üí      router.push('/login');
   246‚Üí      return;
   247‚Üí    }
   248‚Üí  }, [user, router]);
   249‚Üí
   250‚Üí  if (!user) {
   251‚Üí    return (
   252‚Üí      <div className="min-h-screen bg-gray-50 flex items-center justify-center">

   263‚Üí    const url = new URL(window.location.href);
   264‚Üí    
   265‚Üí    if (fpopOpen) {
   266‚Üí      url.searchParams.set('fpop', 'open');
   267‚Üí

   279‚Üí      }

   285‚Üí      });
   286‚Üí    }
   287‚Üí    
   288‚Üí    // Update URL without triggering page reload
   289‚Üí    window.history.replaceState({}, '', url.toString());
   290‚Üí    
   291‚Üí    // Trigger custom event to update our URL display
   292‚Üí    window.dispatchEvent(new Event('urlchange'));
   293‚Üí  };
